nodes.text: The Outlaw's Den, known by the reconstituted Sith Empire as Region 92-2987, was an area located in the Jundland Wastes on Tatooine.

The Den could be reached via the Northern Chasm or the Central Chasm in the south. The Outlaw's Den was a notorious lawless area. It was common for allies and enemies to attack each other in this area, regardless of affiliation.

The Outlaw's Den was a ghost town with a history of conquest. Dozens of gangs, pirate crews  and even native raiders claimed the region over the years but none managed to hold the lawless area for long. Some rumors said that the land was cursed, while others said that the ghosts of murdered settlers roamed the wretched region and drove trespassers to violence. Even the most hardened locals and wanderers considered it an unsafe place and therefore avoided it.

The Outlaw's Den was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing video game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It appears in the game as a player versus player area. The area also contains a Galactic Trade Network kiosk.
